review: The STB is the worst bank I have ever known. Their customer service is non-existent.
I have had many problems with STB's online transactions. This has caused me a lot of stress and wasted time.
STB has extremely high and opaque fees. I have been charged for things I didn't even understand.
I tried to open an account with STB, but the process was extremely slow and complicated.
The wait times to speak to an STB representative are absolutely unbearable. I have been on hold for over an hour multiple times.
STB denied me a loan without any clear explanation. It was a very frustrating experience.
STB's interest rates are among the highest in the market. I would not recommend this bank to anyone looking for an advantageous loan.
STB account security is a real issue. I have been a victim of fraud and it was very difficult to recover my money.
I tried to get help to resolve an issue with my account, but STB's customer service was not helpful at all.
STB has policies that are incredibly restrictive. I have had trouble accessing my own money on several occasions.
STB account statements are difficult to understand and read. There are hidden fees everywhere.
STB was not able to answer my questions about the different financial products it offers.
I was a victim of discrimination by STB. I do not recommend this bank to anyone who cares about equality.
STB was not able to provide me with accurate information about the services it offers. This left me puzzled and uncertain about using this bank.
STB is very slow in processing transactions and transfers. This has caused me problems with my bills and expenses.
I had trouble accessing my online account with STB. The site is slow and unfriendly.
STB has a bad reputation in Tunisia and for good reason: their service is very poor.
I tried to cancel a transfer with STB, but the process was very difficult and I ultimately had to give up.
